DOC.brief_summary: It is a comparative study of Safety and Efficacy of Canaloplasty and Non-penetrating Deep Sclerectomy Combined With Phacoemulsification to Treat Glaucoma and Cataract. It is a Randomised, Prospective Study.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Canaloplasty and Non-penetrating Deep Sclerectomy With Phacoemulsification to Treat Glaucoma and Cataract
